You: implement a simple hellp program\par
Agent: Thinking...\par
Agent: Certainly, I'd be happy to help you with that! Here is the C# implementation of your request. The code will prompt for user input and print out "Hello [User Input]". If not otherwise specified in this context it assumes a default message 'World'. \par
```csharp  \par
using System;\par
class Program \{   \par
static void Main(string[] args)     \{       //main method where the program starts execution     \par
Console.Write("Enter your name: ");        //asking for user input         \par
String username = Console.ReadLine();         //reads entered string from console  \par
if (username == String.Empty || null==null)\{    //checks if no value has been provided  by the programmer or not, it assumes 'World' as default message     \par
Console.WriteLine("Hello World");          //printing "hello world" when there is nothing entered         else             Console . Write Line (" Hello \{0\}", username);        \}     End of Main Method    \}\} ```  END OF CODE BLOCK  ```csharp ''''END''CODEBLOCK\par
